sys_variable_value.value:
Dear ${username},

We notice your ${products} has been in the catalogue for a month and unfortunately no one has taken it.

What our next suggestion would be is to donate it to a local charity.

Kind regards,

 

Green Swap Shop

<p>We notice your ${products} has been in the catalogue for a month and unfortunately no one has taken it.</p>
<p>What our next suggestion would be is to donate it to a local charity.</p>
<p>Kind regards,</p>
<p> </p>
